name: Batana
description: Butana or Butternut squash is rich in important vitamins, minerals, and disease-fighting antioxidants. This low-calorie, fiber-rich winter squash may help you lose weight and protect against conditions like cancer, heart disease, and mental decline. Plus, it’s versatile and easily added to both sweet and savory dishes. Incorporating butternut squash into a balanced diet is an easy and delicious way to boost your health.
